message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today.  I think it would be very valuable to you.  Given its features, I'm asking for $20,000.  What do you think?
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can't commit to such a high price. Would you consider lowering it to $15,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is a bit too low for me to consider.  Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
I understand your position, Alice. While I'm willing to negotiate, I still can't meet you at $17,500. Can we discuss something closer to $15,000?
